creator: apache.bug@hogi.de
text:
Visiting the examples http://xml.apache.org/batik/batikDemo.html
the underlying checks don't detect my WebStart installation.

As Copy&Paste from the soure works, it would be great, if you could
an a link to the jwsRedirect.html for these cases???

Best regards

:o) Hogi

creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
text:
I commited a link to the JavaWebStart site at the bottom of batikDemo.html.
This will be show up on the public site after the next release where we will
have a web site update (probably 1.5beta3).
